'''''Amon Hen'' 229''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[May]] [[2011]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen229.jpg|Aragorn and Arwen]]''
** By: Francesca Barbini
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* [[Leeds]] Blue Plaque Proposal
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Seminar Announcement
* [[Oxonmoot 2011|Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Along the Road - [[The Return of the Ring|2012 news]]
** By: [[Angela Gardner|Angie Gardner]]/Lynn Whitaker
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Obituary: Diana Wynne Jones
** By: Jessica Yates
* Report: Annual Dinner Speech
** By: [[Charles Noad|Charles E. Noad]]
* My Virtual Life in Middle-earth
** By: Francesca Barbini
* And the Stars Were Hidden
** By: [[Kristine Larsen]]
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Artwork: Untitled ([[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]])
** By: [[Kay Woollard]]
* Review: ''Mirkwood''
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Nen
** By: Clay Evans
* Artwork: ''Ranger''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Letters
* Around the World in 80(?) [[Tolkien Societies|Societies]]
** By: Tolkien Lietuva
* Poem: ''Now''
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile
** By: Ruth Brown
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
